backend/main.mo: Actor providing access control, user profiles, page content, pricing entries, and CSR info with Map-based storage and permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a theme color display feature to its related files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend files for documentation or build planning.
frontend/ic-assets.json: Specifies asset rules for deployment, ensuring '.well-known' files are included.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry file with German metadata, SEO description, and Plausible Analytics script.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Lists verified domains for Internet Computer canister configuration.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap defining URLs, priorities, and update frequencies for the site's pages.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, React Query client, theming, and application-level providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/ThemeHexCo: Admin UI component showing computed theme HEX colors with copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/CalendlyInlineWi: Reusable component that loads and renders an inline Calendly booking widget.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Global layout with header navigation, mobile menu, scroll-to-top behavior, and reload logic for the contact page.
frontend/src/components/MobileReadMore.t: Component providing collapsible mobile-only content with toggle controls and optional feature flag behavior.
frontend/src/config/featureFlags.ts: Defines app-wide feature flags such as mobile read‑more behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actors, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCalendlyScript.ts: Ensures the Calendly widget script loads once and reports readiness.
frontend/src/hooks/useComputedThemeHexCo: Computes theme HEX colors at runtime by probing DOM styles and recalculates on theme changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, status, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching CSR metadata and generating new CSRs in the browser.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Sets SEO metadata and renders an about page with biography text and a hero image.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Configures SEO tags and renders a contact page with direct contact options and a Calendly booking widget.
frontend/src/pages/CouplesPage.tsx: Sets SEO metadata and presents information and booking options for couples coaching services.
frontend/src/pages/CSRGeneratorPage.tsx: Generates, displays, copies, and downloads CSR data with metadata loading and DNS checks.
frontend/src/pages/DomainVerificationPag: Fetches and validates the domain verification file and displays success or error status.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Sets SEO metadata, structured data, and renders the homepage with hero content and service highlights.
frontend/src/pages/LegalPage.tsx: Displays the legal notices and privacy information with structured sections and styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/MenPage.tsx: Configures metadata for the men's coaching page and renders hero text with detailed coaching descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Defines pricing information, SEO tags, and an FAQ section for coaching services.
frontend/src/pages/SitemapPage.tsx: Generates and displays an XML sitemap with metadata and a list of public site URLs.
frontend/src/pages/TechnicalStatusPage.t: Runs diagnostic checks for DNS, SSL, redirects, and analytics, showing results in a technical status dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/WomenPage.tsx: React page for women’s coaching with hero content and SEO metadata setup.
frontend/src/pages/ZurichCouplesLandingP: Landing page for Zurich couples counseling with SEO tags and a call-to-action layout.
frontend/src/types/calendly.d.ts: TypeScript declarations for Calendly widget functions on the Window object.
frontend/src/utils/color.ts: Utilities for converting CSS color formats to HEX, including rgb, rgba, and oklch.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, layout, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing project state, features, and version information.
